body_html:
The demo was deliberately turned off.
The new website is supposed to display a nice message explaining that the demo is gone, but transition to the new website has been slow. I'll check if we're going to switch soon, and if not we'll put a better warning message.

body:
The demo was deliberately turned off.
The new website is supposed to display a nice message explaining that the demo is gone, but transition to the new website has been slow. I'll check if we're going to switch soon, and if not we'll put a better warning message.
